snippet: The N.H.L. said it penalized the Flyers’ Claude Giroux, who delivered a late hit on the Devils’ Dainius Zubrus, in part because he had displayed signs of frustration on the ice.
abstract: The N.H.L. said it penalized the Flyers’ Claude Giroux, who delivered a late hit on the Devils’ Dainius Zubrus, in part because he had displayed signs of frustration on the ice.

headline.main: Flyers' Giroux Suspended for Hit to the Head
headline.print_headline: Roundup: Flyers’ Giroux Suspended for One Game Because of Hit to the Head
